item.title: Education Participants’ Conference held in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[The action plan on preparation for children’s learning has been shaped through the Education Participants’ Conference to improve the quality of education in the Kalyana Karnataka Region, Akash S., Additional Commissioner of School Education, Kalaburagi, said on Friday. He was addressing a conference at Jagajyothi Basaveshwar Auditorium at University of Agriculture Sciences (UAS) in Raichur.
The conference was held in Kalaburagi and Ballari for two years to discuss improving quality in education...]]>
item.author: Authors
